#summary Reddit style voting with the `voting` application
#labels Featured

= Reddit Style Voting =

A template snippet for building those famous [http://programming.reddit.com reddit] up and down voting arrows which cast or clear your votes.

{{{
{% load voting_tags %}
{% vote_by_user user scene as vote %}
<form action="{% if vote and vote.is_upvote %}clear{% else %}up{% endif %}vote/" method="POST">
  <input type="hidden" name="next" value="/scenes/{{ scene.id }}/">
  <input type="image" src="/img/aup{% if vote and vote.is_upvote %}mod{% else %}grey{% endif %}.png">
</form>
<form action="{% if vote and vote.is_downvote %}clear{% else %}down{% endif %}vote/" method="POST">
  <input type="hidden" name="next" value="/scenes/{{ scene.id }}/">
  <input type="image" src="/img/adown{% if vote and vote.is_downvote %}mod{% else %}grey{% endif %}.png">
</form>
}}}

You could go on to [http://domscripting.com/blog/display/41 progressively enhance] these forms with XMLHttpRequest.
